summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 29th Avenue Northeast in the City of Seattle, from East 55th Street to the north line of Shay's Ravenna Addition to the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and by constructing concrete sidewalks on the east side thereof, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 36140 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
